## 2 Weeks, 3 National Parks, 5 States and 6000 km

![](images/5states_6000kms.jpeg)

What a great road trip to WA, ID, MT, WY, and OR. Been to Yellowstone, Glacier, Crater Lake National Parks, and rode the Beartooth HWY. We logged 6000 kms, both Suzy and Nomad passed 10000 kms.
